comments.body:
> The doc example of `CreateNamedStruct` is
> 
> ```
> > SELECT _FUNC_("a", 1, "b", 2, "c", 3);
>        {"a":1,"b":2,"c":3}
> ```
> 
> I think it's a valid syntax for named rows.

I got it, seems because I run this  SQL in normal UT, i just return struct data's value part. I was misled.
